section.title: Using profiles and properties in Maven
section.section:
Using profiles
Maven supports the usage of profiles to define different configurations. If you start Maven, you can instruct it to use a certain profile, i.e., on the command line via the -P parameter followed directly (without whitespace) by the profile. For example -PyourProfile .

Using properties
You can specify properties in your build files and override them in on the command line with the -D followed directly (without whitespace) by the parameter. See the next chapter for an example.
